summary_promot:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Metadata:
            - Document Title: Commander Beetle
            - Section Title: Commander Beetle Boss Fight and Guide

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "# Commander Beetle

The Commander Beetle is an optional Yaoguai Chief boss fight that you can find during Chapter 4 of Black Myth Wukong. Located between the Forest of Ferocity and the Temple Entrance itself, this boss trains a group of Daoists who will all try to stop you.

* Rewards: Commander Beetle Spirit, Knot of Voidness, Refined Iron Sand, 1562 Experience, 1434 Will


The Commander Beetle is an optional boss -- though hard to miss as you explore the Temple of Yellow Flowers. From the Forest of Ferocity Shrine, you need only make your way along the main path and up the stairs to find a large courtyard where the boss trains a group of several Sword Daoists.

## Commander Beetle Boss Fight and Guide

However, if he decides to hold his left weapon up by his face in a reverse grip fashion, it will become his shield, and he'll be able to soak any blows you try and land on him (even when Immobilized). Hit him too many times, and he'll launch into a swift two-hit counterattack. Luckily, you can counter his counter with a well-timed Rock Solid to throw him off."
            - Following Text: "Along with a variety of lunging attacks and dual-wield slashes, he also has a few unorthodox moves. If he tries to headbutt you by leaping on his side, resist the impulses to kick him when he's down. He'll recover from falling to the ground by doing a breakdancing kick spin while slashing with both swords to lift off the ground and damage you if you get close."

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
            3. Incorporate any relevant metadata (e.g., section or document titles) to improve coherence, **but do not assume any domain-specific knowledge** unless explicitly stated.
            4. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.



            Output Format:
            Preceding Text Summary:
            Provide a concise summary of the preceding text that gives context to the image.
            Image Summary:
            Provide a summary of the image, describing its purpose and content based on the context.
            Following Text Summary:
            Provide a concise summary of the following text that elaborates on the information related to the image.
img_summary:
Preceding Text Summary:
The preceding text introduces Commander Beetle as an optional boss in *Black Myth: Wukong*, encountered in Chapter 4 between the Forest of Ferocity and the Temple Entrance. The boss trains a group of Daoists and is hard to miss while exploring the Temple of Yellow Flowers. Rewards for defeating Commander Beetle include items like the Commander Beetle Spirit and Knot of Voidness, along with experience points. The text also provides a combat tip: if Commander Beetle uses his left weapon as a shield, he can counterattack after absorbing hits, but players can counter this with a well-timed Rock Solid move.

Image Summary:
The image depicts an active boss fight against Commander Beetle in *Black Myth: Wukong*. The player character is engaged in close combat, seemingly landing a blow on the boss, who is dual-wielding weapons and surrounded by glowing effects. The environment shows a stone courtyard with traditional architectural elements in the background, consistent with the Temple of Yellow Flowers setting. HUD elements display health bars, abilities, and other combat-related information, emphasizing the intensity of the encounter.

Following Text Summary:
The following text elaborates on Commander Beetle's attack patterns, including lunging strikes, dual-wield slashes, and unconventional moves like a headbutt followed by a breakdancing kick spin. Players are advised to avoid attacking immediately after certain moves, as the boss can recover quickly and deal damage with spinning slashes.
